document_data.name: ''Cloak of stars''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''cloak of stars''''' was an enchanted [[cloak]] that originated from [[Evermeet]].''
document_data.Description: This midnight blue cloak gleamed with hundreds of small stars.
document_data.Powers: The ''cloak of stars'' imparted invisibility from all forms of normal and magical vision if worn on a starry night under the open sky. The cloak also functioned as a strong ''[[cloak of protection]]''.
